name: OH NO ZOMBIEZ
description:
*Both files are needed to run the game.*

**This Game is probbaby buggy , but this was made in 2 Days for a Game Jam and i have never developed  a Game in just 2 Days, let alone ever done a game jam,. I have made other games in the past but this was a challenge. Updates will be coming soon**

This game is you against ZOMBIEZ , the goal is to get the Highest score possible. 

ASWD or UP DOWN LEFT RIGHT to move, SPACE to FIRE
